meanings.definition: A type of hat with a flat, round crown and a small brim.
meanings.sent1: He wore a stylish flatcaps to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The shop sold various flatcaps in different colors.
meanings.sent3: The flatcaps flew off in the wind, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were hidden under the shadow of the flatcaps.
meanings.sent5: The flatcaps perched on the heads of the children like colorful birds.
